title: Citywars Tower Defense
notes: Steam shows 1,111 user reviews; SteamDB lists Full Controller Support and Shared/Split Screen Co-op; dev confirms split-screen and online play can be combined. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Survival tower defense. Can be played in co-op in split screen where each screen is a full instance of the game connected via network multiplayer. No hard limit to number of local players
